Package com.camerontec.util.logger.hpl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IHighPerformanceBeacon
    Interface to be implemented by High Performance Beacons.
    IHighPerformanceLogEventListener<E>
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of receiving HighPerformanceLogEvents.
    IHighPerformanceLoggerAppender
    Interface to be implemented by Catalys high performance logger appenders.
    IHighPerformanceLoggerMXBean
    Higher performance logger JMX management API.
    IHighPerformanceLoggerWriter
    API for writing high performance log files.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractHighPerformanceAppender
    Base class for high performance appender implementations.
    BytesSegmentBufferFactory
    Factory for creation of all BytesSegmentBuffer instances used in the HPL subsystem.
    HighPerformanceAsynchronousAppender
    High performance asynchronous appender implementation.
    HighPerformanceLogEvent
    High performance logging event class.
    HighPerformanceLogger
    High performance logger implementation.
    HighPerformanceLoggerConfiguration
    Class responsible for providing configuration for the high performance logger.
    HighPerformanceLoggerFactory
    Class containing all context associated with the Catalys High Performance Logging subsystem.
    HighPerformanceSynchronousAppender
    Synchronous log appender implementation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HighPerformanceLogEvent.Offset
    Serialized header fixed field offsets.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HighPerformanceLoggerConfigurationException
    Exception thrown to indicate an error during configuration of the high performance logging subsystem.
